title: Company Shares of S&T Bancorp, Inc. (NASDAQ:STBA) Rally 0.37%
text:
Company Shares of S&T Bancorp, Inc. (NASDAQ:STBA) Rally 0.37% Company Shares of S&T Bancorp, Inc. (NASDAQ:STBA) Rally 0.37% September 14, 2015 â€¢ 
Shares of S&T Bancorp, Inc. (NASDAQ:STBA) appreciated by 0.37% during the past week but lost 3.22% on a 4-week basis. The shares have underperformed the S&P 500 by 1.67% during the past week but S&T Bancorp, Inc. (NASDAQ:STBA) has outperformed the index in 4 weeks by 3.22%. 
The company shares have rallied 17.82% in the past 52 Weeks. On July 22, 2015 The shares registered one year high of $32.88 and one year low was seen on October 8, 2014 at $23.07. The 50-day moving average is $30.23 and the 200 day moving average is recorded at $29.07. S&P 500 has rallied 1.23% during the last 52-weeks. 
S&T Bancorp, Inc. (NASDAQ:STBA) rose 0.37% or 0.11 points on Friday and made its way into the gainers of the day. After trading began at $29.41 the stock was seen hitting $29.9 as a peak level and $29.37 as the lowest level. The stock ended up at $29.75. The daily volume was measured at 82,133 shares. The 52-week high of the share price is $32.88 and the 52-week low is $23.07. The company has a market cap of $1,036 million. 
S&T Bancorp Inc. is up 4.85% in the last 3-month period. Year-to-Date the stock performance stands at 1.71%. On a different note, The Company has disclosed insider buying and selling activities to the Securities Exchange, The director, of S&T Bancorp Inc, Gibson James Thomas had unloaded 25,000 shares at $31.3 per share in a transaction on July 24, 2015. The total value of transaction was $782,500. The Insider information was revealed by the Securities and Exchange Commission in a Form 4 filing. Currently the company Insiders own 2.8% of S&T Bancorp Inc. Company shares. In the past six months, there is a change of -9.63% in the total insider ownership. Institutional Investors own 48.5% of Company shares. During last 3 month period, 5.03% of total institutional ownership has changed in the company shares. 
S&T Bancorp, Inc. (NASDAQ:STBA): 3 Analyst have given the stock of S&T Bancorp, Inc. (NASDAQ:STBA) a near short term price target of $31.67. The standard deviation reading, which is a measure by which the stock price is expected to swing away from the mean estimate, is at $0.58. The higher price target estimate is at $32 while the lower price estimates are fixed at $31. 
S&T Bancorp, Inc. (S&T) is a bank holding company and has three wholly owned subsidiaries, S&T Bank, 9th Street Holdings, Inc. and STBA Capital Trust I. The Company also owns certain interest in Commonwealth Trust Credit Life Insurance Company. As of December 31, 2012, the Company had approximately $3.4 billion in loans and $3.6 billion in deposits. S&T Bank is a full service bank. It provides its services to its customers through offices located in Allegheny, Armstrong, Blair, Butler, Cambria, Clarion, Clearfield, Indiana, Jefferson and Westmoreland counties of Pennsylvania. It operates in three segments: Community Banking, Wealth Management and Insurance. Its Community Banking segment offers services, which include accepting time and demand deposit accounts, originating commercial and consumer loans, and providing letters of credit and credit card services. The Wealth Management segment offers discount brokerage services, services as executor and trustee under wills and deeds.
